text:
Hi Saint! Apologies for the late response - I don't receive notifications from Slack sometimes!  
Let me introduce myself - I am Nili Bhavsar and I'm currently studying character animation at Central Saint Martins. I do traditional 2D animation and I have keen interest in pre-production side (especially concept art, character design and story art altogether).
You can see some of my works at <http://www.artofnili.com|www.artofnili.com>
